author: A_Brickset_user
title: Amazing
review:
With over 200 pieces and 40 examples (although only 13 models are thoroughly explained) and a relatively low cost, it is one of the best boxes of the last few years.
Actually, small kids will sink their teeth in the instructions booklet, but everybody else will try to reach their imagination's limit, thanks to the many different pieces.

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Great little vehicles
review:
I just bought this yesterday. Normally I'm taking reviews of all or some of the models, but this has too much for doing it that way. The whole set has a little bit over 200pcs at a rather low price of 15â‚¬. The set has Ideas for 40 models and instructions for 13 of them, but when searching through brickshelf and other related sites you find many more and even some more instructions if you search carefully. So this set has extremely much variety of models even outside the instructions. The only thing I don't like so is, that there isn't anything at 
Minifig-Scale, but the creations are so small, that this isn't a big drawback. But with some ideas even minifig-scale creations can be build. So overall a great smaller designer set.

author: I_like_Lego
title: My very first lego set
review:
This was my first Lego set i ever got.And it was it is mostly yellow bricks,it has allot of nice pieces like see through pieces,wheels,lever,mostly yellow pieces.

Pros:)
.Allot of yellow pieces
.Wheels
.Yellow and black hinge bricks
.Yellow lever
.See through bricks
.Smooth tires
.See through yellow stud
.Every other brick

Cons:(
.NONE
Overall 10/10 but now the set is in pieces and i can't find them.
